title: Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   What sculpts a sand dune?               Why is the Pitcher's thistle threatened?               What lights up the night sky?               Are there bear in Sleeping Bear Dunes?               What lurks beneath the sand?         Â     Learn more about Sleeping Bear Dunes: News Browse press releases, check out videos, and dig into archived news. Photos and more Experience the park wherever you are! Check out our photo galleries, virtual tours, videos and more. History & Culture Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore is rich in history from early Native American cultures to the shipping, logging, and agricultural heritage of the area.  Nature Northern hardwood and conifer forest, abandoned farm site meadows, wetlands, lakes, streams, and bogs and splendid examples of glacially caused landforms, Sleeping Bear Dunes offers a wonderful opportunity for just enjoying nature at its best.  Education Plan a class visit, enjoy traveling trunks, and pick up ideas for classroom lessons. Kids and Youth Become a Junior Ranger and find suggestions for family activities in the park. Management Check out park statistics, park planning, and the park's laws and policies. Bookstore Eastern National is the non-profit partner of Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.
